overview_of_class: Students will learn to analyze situations and craft implementation plans using three perspectives on organizations?strategic design, political and cultural. While leading and managing others always presents challenges, our goal in this course is to use the three perspectives to develop a more complete understanding of these challenges and how to address them.
name: Organizational Processes in Creative Enterprises
title: SoC MSLCE 460-0-20 Organizational Processes in Creative Enterprises
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Registration is reserved for students in the MSLCE students only.

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Students will learn to analyze situations and craft implementation plans using three perspectives on organizations?strategic design, political and cultural. While leading and managing others always presents challenges, our goal in this course is to use the three perspectives to develop a more complete understanding of these challenges and how to address them.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: Course pack with all readings available via course Canvas page.
